description: 气泡卡片，支持六个方向，小箭头在各个方向均基于挂载的子元素居中放置，支持受控和非受控模式。

descriptionTags.en: Bubble card, supports six directions, small arrows are centered in each direction based on the mounted sub-elements, and supports controlled and uncontrolled modes.
descriptionTags.name: 气泡卡片

children.description:
气泡载体，组件会监听其变化以重新计算布局，建议用 useMemo 包裹

tags.en: Bubble carrier, the component will listen to its changes to recalculate the layout, it is recommended to wrap it with useMemo

useAutoDirection.description:
气泡边界自适应，开启时会在气泡左右边界留出安全距离，气泡与视窗上下边界小于安全距离时改变气泡的垂直方向，使其在视窗中漏出
@en The bubble boundary is self-adaptive. When turned on, it will leave a safe distance between the left and right boundaries of the bubble. When the upper and lower boundaries of the bubble and the window are smaller than the safe distance, the vertical direction of the bubble will be changed to make it leak out of the window.
useAutoDirection.name: useAutoDirection

tags.en: The bubble boundary is self-adaptive. When turned on, it will leave a safe distance between the left and right boundaries of the bubble. When the upper and lower boundaries of the bubble and the window are smaller than the safe distance, the vertical direction of the bubble will be changed to make it leak out of the window.

useAutoDirection.descWithTags: 气泡边界自适应，开启时会在气泡左右边界留出安全距离，气泡与视窗上下边界小于安全距离时改变气泡的垂直方向，使其在视窗中漏出

edgeOffset.description:
气泡距离边界的安全距离，单位为px
@en The safe distance of the bubble from the border, in px

tags.en: The safe distance of the bubble from the border, in px

edgeOffset.descWithTags: 气泡距离边界的安全距离，单位为px
